name: Wishful Thinking
description:
Wishful Thinking is a Yume Nikki Fangame that I've been working on for a while  in RPGMaker 2003, where you explore the dreams of Joshua, a 13 year old boy.

Joshua is a curious and somewhat childish person who loves to read. He uses his dreams to comfort himself.

As of now, the only thing to do is explore the dream world and collect Ideas to help with exploring.  (In the future, music boxes and keys will be implemented, and are needed to access an ending.)

Current version: Alpha

Current Features:

- 5 Ideas (There are 9 planned)

- No Ending  (2 are planned, a Bad Ending and a Good Ending)

-1 Event (There are 10 planned)

If there are any bugs, comment them so I can attempt to fix them ASAP.

Note: Some worlds do not have BGM, sorry in advance. I hope to have them for the Beta version.

Thanks for checking out this game, and I hope you enjoy it.
